name: Pixgen Sandbox Building Game
description:
Pixgen is a sandbox type building game. You will have the ability to create items, buildings(like prebuilt houses and other cool house like buildings), structures(like towers, bridges, etc. You have the ability to rotate items and place them where you like. You can freeze an object mid air or attach a torch to a tree, floor, or ceiling! You can rotate objects around to position them to your liking! Alot of cool features planned ahead feel free to comment!

To get started when game starts press "I" to open up inventory and it should show you instructions! Enjoy:)
